repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: Images depict the Warwick Mills building in Centreville, R.I., after the Great Hurricane of 1938.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Includes photographs of the Warwick Mills building in Centreville, R.I., after the Great Hurricane of 1938. Two exterior views and one interior view of the damage to fourth-story on left-hand end of building. Corner of fourth floor has been opened up to the elements.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Warwick Mills Photographs #6937 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Item 1: Hurricane damage to exterior of Warwick Mills

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print. Image depicts the Warwick Mills building in Centreville, R.I., after the Great Hurricane of 1938. Four-story brick building; damage to fourth-story on left-hand end of building. Corner of fourth floor has been opened up to the elements. 21.5 x 16.5 cm.

did.unittitle: Item 2: Hurricane damage to interior of Warwick Mills

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print. Image depicts the Warwick Mills building in Centreville, R.I., after the Great Hurricane of 1938. Damage from hurricane evident from inside the top (fourth) story of the building; part of the roof appears to have caved in; bricks are piled by the wall that is open to the outside. 21.5 x 16.5 cm.

did.unittitle: Item 3: Hurricane damage to Warwick Mills and surrounding area

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Gelatin silver print. Image depicts the Warwick Mills building in Centreville, R.I., after the Great Hurricane of 1938. Fourth floor has been opened up to the elements; uprooted trees in foreground almost obscure the building. 21.5 x 16.5 cm.
